name: Maestro (itch)
description:
Maestro is a fun and frantic music-themed action adventure game. The combat uses a unique rhythm based timing system which allows players to experience the fun and excitement of hitting music notes while fending of Goblins and Skeletons.

Players take control of a wandering Bard in the land of Sonata, attempting to bring harmony to the four regions through a witty and charming narrative style.

Average play time: 15 - 30 minutes

---------

Maestro started development in February 2020 with a team of 4 at Falmouth University, alongside a separate study module. The Ninth Orbit team has applied to Tranzfuser with this project after bringing on several other developers.

Original Team:

  • Aaron Thearle - Programming & Art
  • Pol Porta - A.I.
  • Thomas Pedersen - Music & SFX
  • Johan Holm - Design

Additional Tranzfuser Members:

  • Anna Latchman - Environment Art
  • Bethany Cottle - Character Art & Animation
  • Hugh Holbech - Sound Design
  • Robbie Wastell - Design & Programming
  • Benjamin Williams - Story & Narrative Design
